api_list.api_description: Retrieve a specified number of quotes from Breaking Bad.

optional_parameters.name: number
optional_parameters.description: The number of quotes to retrieve.

api_list.api_description: Fetches a specified number of random Ron Swanson quotes.

query: I have 2 numbers in mind. I'm compiling inspirational quotes for a presentation. Can you fetch 3 quotes from Breaking Bad and second number I had in my mind for quotes from Ron Swanson?
